name: Christmas Cookie Craze
description:
**Originally made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare Jam 28!**

It's Christmas morning, and you've just returned from your long flight around the world. All of the presents have been delivered and you're enjoying the holiday party. You've just had one cookie, and you're reaching for a second. But wait! According to the elves, you can only have one.

Now you're upset, and you'll chase down any elf who dares to stand in your way of eating more cookies. Race around the workshop, level by level, and get your cookies from the forces that seek to take them from you!

Controls: Arrow keys to move. P to pause.
